item.title: Contact me - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Contact me E-mail {first_name}@outlook.com is my main e-mail address (you can guess it, do you? ;)). Please note that I’ve tight schedule on behalf of my work, and the result I can’t reply some of your e-mail on time. But, promise me, I will reply your e-mail immediately as possible. You can use PGP to encrypt your e-mail to me: more info. Social media and instant messaging Twitter Facebook Keybase Telegram (for IM, I prefer this method) Facebook Messenger Others My personal blog on Medium My GitHub account

item.title: Disclaimer - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Disclaimer Any opinions I express online under “Nohirara” (as my) name, unless stated otherwise, are solely my own and not represents Indonesian Wikipedia and my office where I’m working right now.

item.title: PGP - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: PGP Last key update: October 8, 2020 You can download my public key (fingerprint CC95 6E13 40C5 8EB5 9FBA 542C C77B 602D E8CD 650C) from here. Interested using PGP? I’m using PGP to encrypt my email. If you interested to use PGP, go here to read some explanations and here to watch how to use it. I recommend you to using Keybase as first step to learn.

item.title: Recent work - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Recent work Administrator on Indonesian Wikipedia (my Wikipedia account). Make some tweet on Indonesian Wikipedia official Twitter account, along with my besties to help me. ;) Currently work as public relation and marketing manager at startup company in Jakarta, Indonesia. Maintain Evelyn -VTuber- Discord server as moderator. Watching YouTube (especially Virtual YouTuber) in free time.
